divergences.description: Agent A and Agent C still recommend Qwen2.5-VL, while the updated guidance indicates Qwen3-VL should be the primary 2026-era choice.
Agent A and Agent C do not include an OCR-specialist model (e.g., GLM-OCR), while the updated guidance recommends a hybrid VLM + OCR stack for faithful text extraction.

rationale: Agent A is the most implementation-ready, but both A and C diverge on model generation and OCR specialist inclusion. These are substantive architecture differences, so convergence is moderate.
